title: As Roe v. Wade hangs in the balance, Democratic candidates prioritize abortion rights in 2022

sentence: Incumbent Brian Kemp (R) is facing a primary challenge from former senator David Perdue, who has leaned into the idea that the 2020 election in the state was stolen and that it's Kemp's fault.
title: Another indicator that Republican primaries may not center on 2020
